        public void closeRoom()

      • processCommands

        public void processCommands(java.lang.String input,
                   UserThread user)
        Command list: c [text] - new chat entry m [chess standard] - play x - user left room, user loses game. Game continues d - user attempting to draw the game, prompt opponent a - user accepted to draw match. Game end f - user forfeits current game. Game ends default - unknown command. Re-inform players about current turn
        Specified by:
        processCommands in class Window
        See Also:
        Window.processCommands(java.lang.String, users.UserThread)

        Returns:

      • inputInt

        public int[][] inputInt(java.lang.String string)
        Convert standard chess notation to matrix representing move's initial and final position
        Parameters:
        string - standard chess notation [[a-h][1-8](initial)][[a-h][1-8](final)]
        Returns:
        matrix representing move [0-7][0-7](initial) [0-7][0-7](final)

      • reverseInput

        public java.lang.String reverseInput(java.lang.String whiteMove)
        Reverse move's row Client interface has reversed indexing Used when receiving move from white player
        Parameters:
        whiteMove - white move received
        Returns:
        string with rows reverse i.e 1 becomes 8 and vice-versa 2->7 ...
